page.title: 16Bentilee Playscheme
page.content: Bentilee Playscheme was started in 1978 ,to help develop the community side of Willfield High School. It was also to see if it would help to cut down the amount of damage caused by vandals. It is run for 2 weeks at the beginning of August from 10am to 12am, 1pm to 3pm each day.Boys at Willfield made go-carts and small toys ready for the next 1979 scheme.That year 200 children came. In 1980 so many children came that they were divided into 2 groups,4-9 year olds and 10-15 year olds.That year saw the first day trip to Drayton Manor Park.The following year we used Brookhouse School,where the first water fight was held.Now there are water fights every year.There are also discos,painting,bikes,fancy dress competitions, and day trips.
